game.name: Shape Swarm
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Survive the evolving Shape Swarm in this fast-paced bullet heaven. Enemies adapt, grow stronger, and counter your build as the chaos escalates. Every upgrade buys you time—but the swarm never stops evolving.
